title: (x) Colombo bold aldine serif - Bembo {Frank S}
content:
Dear All,  
I need to know the font used for this logo.

Thank you!!!

Diana

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216182720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/colombo_5970.png)
author: dyanasid

comments.content: sorry... now the img is available :P

I agree Schnappi -- looks like they took [Bembo Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216182720/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125118.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=COLOMBO&sampleSize=48) and put a stroke on it to make it thicker.

Skylar
